sql.query: select nvl(max(CIBIL_RESSNO+1),1) as maxid from CIBIL_RESPONSE_TABLE where cibil_resinwardno='^'
insert into cibil_response_table(cibil_ressno,cibil_resinwardno,cibil_responsedata,cibil_resusrid,cibil_resdate) values(?,?,?,?,sysdate)
select nvl(max(TUEF_SNO+1),1) as maxid from cibil_tuef_response where tuef_inwardno='^' and tuef_response_sno='^'
select cibil_responsedata from cibil_response_table where cibil_resinwardno='^' and cibil_ressno='^'

insert into cibil_tuef_response(tuef_sno,tuef_response_sno,tuef_inwardno,tuef_segmenttag, tuef_version,tuef_refnum,tuef_futureuse1,tuef_futureuse2,tuef_enqmemcode,tuef_subjectretcode, tuef_control_number,tuef_date_processed) values(?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,to_date(?,'dd/mm/yyyy HH24:MI:SS'))
select nvl(max(PN_SNO+1),1) as maxid from cibil_pn_response where pn_inward_number='^' and pn_response_sno='^'

insert into cibil_pn_response(pn_sno, pn_response_sno, pn_inward_number, pn_segment_tag, pn_consname1, pn_consname2, pn_consname3, pn_consname4, pn_consname5, pn_dob, pn_gender, pn_panno, pn_passportno, pn_voterid, pn_telephone, pn_additionalid) values(?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,to_date(?,'dd/mm/yyyy'),?,?,?,?,?,?)
select nvl(max(SC_SNO+1),1) as maxid from cibil_sc_response where sc_inward_number='^' and sc_response_sno='^'

insert into cibil_sc_response(sc_sno,sc_response_sno,sc_inward_number,SC_SCORENAME,SC_CARDNAME, SC_VERSION,SC_SCOREDATE,SC_SCORE,SC_EXCLUSIONCODE1,SC_EXCLUSIONCODE2,SC_EXCLUSIONCODE3,SC_EXCLUSIONCODE4, SC_EXCLUSIONCODE5,SC_EXCLUSIONCODE6,SC_EXCLUSIONCODE7,SC_EXCLUSIONCODE8,SC_EXCLUSIONCODE9, SC_EXCLUSIONCODE10,SC_RESPONSECODE1,SC_RESPONSECODE2,SC_RESPONSECODE3,SC_RESPONSECODE4,SC_RESPONSECODE5, SC_ERRORCODE,SC_ENQCNTRLNUMBER) values(?,?,?,?,?,?,to_date(?,'dd/mm/yyyy'),?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?)
select nvl(max(PA_SNO+1),1) as maxid from cibil_pa_response where pa_inwardnumber='^' and pa_response_sno='1'

insert into cibil_pa_response(pa_sno,pa_response_sno,pa_inwardnumber,pa_segmenttag,pa_addr1,pa_addr2,pa_addr3,pa_addr4,pa_addr5,pa_statecode, pa_pincode,pa_datereported,pa_membershortname) values(?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,to_date(?,'dd/mm/yyyy'),?)
select nvl(max(tl_SNO+1),1) as maxid from cibil_tl_response where tl_inwardnumber='^' and tl_response_sno='^'
select nvl(max(IQ_SNO+1),1) as maxid from cibil_iq_response where iq_inwardnumber='^' and iq_response_sno='^'
insert into cibil_iq_response(iq_sno,iq_response_sno,iq_inwardnumber,iq_segmenttag,iq_enquirydate,iq_enqmemshortname,iq_enquirypurpose,iq_enquiryamount) values(?,?,?,?,to_date(?,'dd/mm/yyyy'),?,?,?)
select nvl(max(ERRR_SNO+1),1) as maxid from cibil_errr_table where errr_inward_number='^'
insert into cibil_errr_table(errr_sno,errr_inward_number,errr_segment_tag,errr_datetime_processed) values(?,?,?,to_date(?,'dd/mm/yyyy HH24:MI:SS'))
select nvl(max(USRREF_SNO+1),1) as maxid from CIBIL_ERRR_USRREF where USRREF_INWARDNUMBER='^' and USRREF_ERRR_SNO='^'

insert into CIBIL_ERRR_USRREF(usrref_sno,usrref_errr_sno,usrref_inwardnumber,usrref_segmenttag,usrref_memberrefno,usrref_invalidversion, usrref_invalidfieldlength,usrref_invalidtotlength,usrref_invenqpurp,usrref_invenqamt,usrref_invenqmemcode,usrref_enqsegmentmis,usrref_invenqdata, usrref_cibilerrr,usrref_invalidsegtag,usrref_invalidsegorder,usrref_invalidfieldtagorder,usrref_missingreqfield,usrref_reqressizeexceed,usrref_invalidiomedia) values(?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?)

insert into cibil_tl_response(tl_sno,tl_response_sno,tl_inwardnumber,tl_segmenttag,tl_repmemshortname,tl_accountnumber,tl_accounttype,tl_ownershipind, tl_dateopendisb,tl_datelastpay,tl_dateclosed,tl_datereported,tl_highcrdsancamt,tl_currentbalance,tl_amountovd,tl_payhistory1,tl_payhistory2, tl_payhiststrtdate,tl_payhistenddate,tl_status) values(?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,to_date(?,'dd/mm/yyyy'),to_date(?,'dd/mm/yyyy'),to_date(?,'dd/mm/yyyy'),to_date(?,'dd/mm/yyyy'),?,?,?,?,?,to_date(?,'dd/mm/yyyy'),to_date(?,'dd/mm/yyyy'),?)

select inward_custname,to_char(inward_dob,'dd/mm/yyyy') as inward_dob,inward_pantan,INWARD_PASSPORTNUMBER,INWARD_VOTERID,inward_phone,inward_enquirypurpose, inward_add1,inward_add2,inward_state,inward_zipcode,inward_termloanamt,inward_gender from appinwardreg where inward_no='^'
select ca_acc_creditcard_no from cibilaccountinfo where ca_inwardno='^'
select state_cibilcode from laps_states where upper(state_code)=upper('^')
select nvl(max(CIBIL_REQ_SNO+1),1) as maxid from cibil_request_data where cibil_req_inwardno='^'
insert into cibil_request_data(cibil_req_sno,cibil_req_inwardno,cibil_req_filename,cibil_req_userid,cibil_req_createdate,cibil_req_data) values(?,?,?,?,to_date(?,'dd/mm/yyyy HH24:MI:SS'),?)
